function_description: Change the order of a board within a project
initial_state: User is logged into the web app and viewing a project with boards listed in the sidebar.
steps: Locate the board name in the sidebar.
Click and hold on the two arrows button that appears to the left of the board name.
Drag the board to the desired position within the list.
expected_state: The board appears in the new position within the list of boards for the project.
